title: Quora Scraper input schema
description: This is actor input schema for Quora Scraper, it lets you provide search term for your run.

query.title: Search term
query.description: Quora will search for questions using this string.
query.prefill: What is the best way to learn to code?

proxy.title: Proxy configuration
proxy.description: Select proxies to be used by your crawler. NOTE: residential proxies may not work with this scraper

maxPoolSize.title: Max pool size
maxPoolSize.description: Maximum number of sessions in the pool

maxAgeSecs.title: Max age of each session
maxAgeSecs.description: Maximum age of sessions in the pool

maxUsageCount.title: Max usage count of each session
maxUsageCount.description: Maximum number of times a session can be used
